definition: the Jockey Club, Hong Kong philanthropic organization (and former gentleman's club)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Race around the clock at the Kings Cup Derby, for non stop racing action.
sentences.chinese: 在王者赛马会这里有永无休止的赛马竞技。

sentences.english: The horse racing gathering is a great chance for guys to show off horsing skills and win a girl's heart.
sentences.chinese: 赛马会上是年轻人炫耀马技赢得姑娘芳心的绝佳场合。

sentences.english: Who won the Ascot Gold Cup in 1904?
sentences.chinese: 谁获得了1904年爱斯科特赛马会金杯？

sentences.english: I think also special occasions maybe, if you go to a Royal Ascot.
sentences.chinese: 也可能是去特别的场合，比如去皇家赛马会。

sentences.english: The Derby, he reckons, reminds the city to celebrate itself.
sentences.chinese: 他认为是赛马会自身提醒了肯塔基为它而庆祝。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Jockey Club has been designated to be the operator of soccer betting.
sentences.chinese: 香港赛马会获指定为足球博彩的营运机构。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Chi Keung, Director of MJC, has a group photo with representatives of the sponsors of the Charity Day.
sentences.chinese: 澳门赛马会董事李志强先生与一众赞助商代表合照。

sentences.english: Are you going to race your horse at Newmarket next week ?
sentences.chinese: 你要让你的马参加下周在纽马克特的赛马会吗？

sentences.english: Can you tell us what Royal Ascot is?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我们讲讲皇家赛马会是什么吗？

sentences.english: The Media Visit the Jockey Club Kau Sai Chau Public Golf Course…
sentences.chinese: 新闻界参观赛马会滘西洲公众高尔夫球场。

sentences.english: A word of advice: Ascot requires top hat.
sentences.chinese: 一个小建议，阿斯科特赛马会要求戴大礼帽。

sentences.english: With one's hair flying back like the tail of a race-horse.
sentences.chinese: 头发飞扬，就像一匹赛马会上跑马的尾巴。

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: Isle of Man, British Isles (Tw)/see also 馬恩島|马恩岛[Ma3 en1 Dao3]
